金王八幡宮・Konno Hachiman Shrine
水野与七門人野口富太郎源定則・Tomitaro Noguchi
金王八幡宮様には、算額の撮影および掲載の許可を賜り、感謝申し上げます。・We would like to thank Konno Hachimangu for their kind permission to photograph the sangaku and post it in the archive.
